name: Facebook: No Ads, Max. Width 3.0 BETA WEBKIT
description:
LATEST NEWS - 3.0 BETA FINALLY LAUNCHED!!!

Time of Last Update - 12:52am PST (GMT -0700)

============== KEY FEATURES ==============

No right column with ads
Adjusted to use right column space
Chat box only displays "online" friends
Fits fully on 1024x768 resolution

============== PROPS ==============

This style is the cousin of style 36151 and was inspired by style 9274 by user 12817. It will fit fully on 1024x768 resolution.

user.name: DaveyJake
user.about: To find out more about me, your best bet to click on the link below aka my "homepage."
